Prowl's wings don't have feathers in this mode. His whole body is 
metallic.



::Prowl::

Prowl 'watches' Snow Tech extend his shield. He sighs. The past day's 
events were beginning to catch up to him: Iron Raptor's 
transformation, the spark merging, the deal with the Matrix, the 
battle with Shadow, testing out his new abilities, and now this 
encounter. He needed a recharge.

He lifts the furball off his head and hands it to Shadow Cat. Prowl 
walks over to Iron Raptor.

"Lower the shield, I'm not going to shoot you," Prowl says. He looks 
at Iron Raptor.

-Let's get back to the Cybertronian Fire, love,- he says, sliding an 
arm around her. He hoped she'd let him fly her back to base. He 
needed to show Snow Tech that Iron Raptor was his own, Prowl's, not 
anyone else's.
